title: Movie Recommendation! - Marcel the Shell with Shoes On
post: <h3> Marcel the Shell with Shoes on </h3> This is a super cute movie about a 1-inch-tall shell named Marcel, and his journey to find the rest of his family. <br> Marcel used to live with a bunch of other members of a community, until one day they disappeared. Now Marcel lives with only his Grandma in a house that is an Air B&B. None of the guests notice Marcel - until an amateur film maker comes along, and decides to make a documentary about Marcel.  You get to see Marcel living everyday parts of his life, telling stories, and eventually looking for his family. I really enjoyed the style of the movie, which is modeled as a sort of documentary, but also includes stop motion and puppetry in order to bring Marcel and other characters to life. <br> The movie is rated PG, is 1.5 hours long, and you can find where to watch it   <a href="https://www.google.com/search?q=watch+marcel+the+shell+with+shoes+on&rlz=1CAMFAZ_enUS986US986&oq=mar&aqs=chrome.0.69i59j69i57j69i59j69i64j69i59j69i61j69i60j69i61.1161j0j7&sourceid=chrome&ie=UTF-8&si=ACFMAn_SS78MEibKCAWlYss0xRJ_xMTuplOxPXIKGH46gujQMmuDAhq317pRSSPzNWK7hYIKWRpvIKVsolWRI6dZzfQjHUslrlioeZBDQMl66i2Y2nOG_iI1PzO0kfsUVGlK9ohC_9D-ek7YbSQVs1TO5xdAWoBfVqlaxa4_WaTuLSeolsrRb4hwOlhhYCJhujqedkHzaoTj&ictx=1&ved=2ahUKEwi175aqgKGBAxVBj4kEHcsDDBAQyNoBKAB6BAgREAA"> here </a>   <h4> tldr : Y'all should really watch this movie it's super good and really wholesome </h4>
